statements: SELECT * FROM Green_Building_Certification;
SELECT building_name, certification_level FROM Green_Building_Certification WHERE certification_level = 'Platinum';
SELECT building_name, certification_date FROM Green_Building_Certification WHERE certification_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT building_name, sustainability_score FROM Green_Building_Certification ORDER BY sustainability_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM Green_Building_Certification WHERE certification_level IN ('Gold', 'Silver');
SELECT building_name, certification_level FROM Green_Building_Certification WHERE sustainability_score > 80 ORDER BY certification_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM Green_Building_Certification WHERE certification_level = 'Platinum' ORDER BY building_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT building_id, building_name, certification_level, certification_date FROM Green_Building_Certification WHERE sustainability_score BETWEEN 70 AND 90 ORDER BY building_id ASC
SELECT building_name, certification_date FROM Green_Building_Certification WHERE certification_level != 'Gold' AND sustainability_score < 75 ORDER BY certification_level, building_name DESC
SELECT building_name, sustainability_score FROM Green_Building_Certification WHERE certification_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY sustainability_score DESC, building_name ASC
SELECT * FROM building_certification;
SELECT building_name, certification_status FROM building_certification WHERE certification_status='Approved';
SELECT * FROM building_certification WHERE certification_date='2022-01-01';
SELECT building_name, certification_status FROM building_certification WHERE certification_status <> 'Expired';
SELECT building_name, certification_date FROM building_certification ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM building_certification WHERE certification_status = 'Approved';
SELECT building_name, certification_date FROM building_certification ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT building_name, water_usage, energy_consumption FROM building_certification JOIN sustainability_metrics ON building_certification.id = sustainability_metrics.building_id;
SELECT * FROM building_certification WHERE building_name LIKE 'A%';

SELECT building_name, SUM(water_usage) AS total_water_usage FROM building_certification JOIN sustainability_metrics ON building_certification.id = sustainability_metrics.building_id GROUP BY building_name;
SELECT * FROM green_building_certification;
SELECT building_id, certification_level FROM green_building_certification ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT building_id, certification_level, certification_date FROM green_building_certification WHERE certification_level = 'Platinum';
SELECT * FROM sustainability_metrics WHERE metric_value > 1000 ORDER BY metric_name ASC;
SELECT b.owner_id, b.owner_name, a.building_id FROM building_owners b INNER JOIN green_building_certification a ON b.building_id = a.building_id;
SELECT * FROM green_building_certification;
SELECT building_id, certification_level, certification_date FROM green_building_certification ORDER BY building_id DESC;
SELECT b.building_id, b.certification_level, m.metric_name, m.metric_value FROM green_building_certification b JOIN sustainability_metrics m ON b.building_id = m.building_id;
SELECT b.building_id, b.certification_level, o.owner_name FROM green_building_certification b JOIN building_owners o ON b.building_id = o.building_id WHERE b.certification_level = 'Platinum';

SELECT b.building_id, b.certification_level, m.metric_name, m.metric_value, o.owner_name FROM green_building_certification b JOIN sustainability_metrics m ON b.building_id = m.building_id JOIN building_owners o ON b.building_id = o.building_id;
SELECT * FROM Building;
SELECT building_name, address FROM Building WHERE construction_year > 2000;
SELECT * FROM SustainableFeatures WHERE category = 'Energy Efficiency';
SELECT building_name, certification_level FROM Building ORDER BY certification_level DESC;

SELECT b.building_name, s.feature_name, c.agency_name FROM Building b JOIN BuildingSustainability bs ON b.building_id = bs.building_id JOIN SustainableFeatures s ON bs.feature_id = s.feature_id JOIN CertificationAgency c ON bs.certification_year = c.agency_id;
SELECT * FROM Building;
SELECT building_name, address FROM Building ORDER BY construction_year DESC;
SELECT b.building_name, f.feature_name, c.agency_name FROM Building b, SustainableFeatures f, CertificationAgency c WHERE b.building_id = 1 AND f.feature_id = 1 AND c.agency_id = 1;

SELECT b.building_name, f.feature_name, bs.energy_consumption FROM Building b INNER JOIN BuildingSustainability bs ON b.building_id = bs.building_id INNER JOIN SustainableFeatures f ON bs.feature_id = f.feature_id WHERE bs.certification_year = 2021;
SELECT b.building_name, COUNT(bs.feature_id) AS feature_count FROM Building b LEFT JOIN BuildingSustainability bs ON b.building_id = bs.building_id GROUP BY b.building_name HAVING feature_count > 3;
SELECT * FROM GreenBuildingCertification;
SELECT building_name, certification_level FROM GreenBuildingCertification WHERE certification_level = 'Platinum';
SELECT building_name, certification_date FROM GreenBuildingCertification ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM SustainabilityMetrics WHERE energy_consumption > 1000 AND waste_production < 500;
SELECT owner_name, contact_email, contact_phone FROM BuildingOwners WHERE id = 1;
SELECT building_name, certification_level, certification_date FROM GreenBuildingCertification;
SELECT organization_name, headquarters_location, certification_programs FROM CertificationOrganizations;
SELECT building_name, certification_level, certification_date, city, country FROM GreenBuildingCertification JOIN LocationData ON GreenBuildingCertification.id = LocationData.building_id;
SELECT owner_name, contact_email, contact_phone FROM BuildingOwners;

SELECT building_name, certification_level, energy_consumption, waste_production, water_usage FROM GreenBuildingCertification JOIN SustainabilityMetrics ON GreenBuildingCertification.id = SustainabilityMetrics.building_id;
